attributes.action: offer peter tatchell a knighthood for his services to the gay community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: peter has fought all his life for equality for gay and lesbian people

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
